Text: Today Trump declared war on the people of the United States, threatening states that if the did not request federal troops in their states, the troops would be deployed forcibly.  That's illegal, and it would invoke a civil war.

Trump is testing to see whether he can get the military to do his bidding with his enemies. If he can, he is one giant step closer to full authoritarian control. No one should feel safe.
